snippet: Yi Junqing, China’s top guardian of Communist literature, was dismissed from his job on Thursday after an online posting said he had an extramarital affair.
abstract: Yi Junqing, China’s top guardian of Communist literature, is dismissed from his job after allegations in an online posting that he had an extramarital affair.
lead_paragraph: Yi Junqing, China’s top guardian of Communist literature, was dismissed from his job on Thursday after an online posting said he had an extramarital affair.

headline.seo: Tell-All on the Internet Fells Chinese Official
headline.main: Web Tell-All on an Affair Brings Down a Chinese Official
headline.print_headline: Web Tell-All on an Affair Brings Down a Chinese Official
